context.en_us:
Proud Juggernaut laid waste to the
human kingdom, treating their lands
as his own. But when the royal family
moved to expel the beast, it became
a disaster of their own making.

eliminating the castle, for that drew
the dragon in the first place. And yet,
none could approach the citadel
for risk of Juggernaut's wrath.

And indeed, the castle was nestled
among mountains and covered in
dark for most of the day.

那城堡确实位于山间，
一天的大半时间
都被山的阴影所覆盖。

enough to make the dragon leave,

plan into motion.

of the sun in his abode, he was
confused. How could he possibly
hope to sleep in such conditions?

And so he decided to move on to
another suitable home. But when

the mountain once stood, he saw
only the castle of the royal family.

It was next to a pile of rocks which
would create perfect shadows.
And while it was inhabited, that

The royal family of this northern
kingdom was soon decimated.
Let this be a lesson to all who
would seek to puppet a dragon!

人不该有这种
将龙玩弄于股掌之间的企图
